tree.name: Will Riley
tree.note: #21 overall pick from Illinois. WAS traded #18 pick (from MEM) to UTA for #21, #43, and two future 2nd-round picks.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 1st Round Pick (#18)
assetsGivenUp.note: Originally Memphis's pick, acquired by WAS in Feb 2025 trade. Traded to UTA on draft night.
